api_list.api_description: This API returns geolocation information such as country, region, city, latitude & longitude, ZIP code, time zone, ASN, ISP, and more for a given IP address.

required_parameters.name: ip
required_parameters.description: IP address (IPv4 or IPv6) for geolocation lookup.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Format of the response message (json or xml).

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Translation information (ISO639-1) for continent, country, region, and city names.

query: What is the geolocation information for the IP address 8.8.8.8?
